task.title: BMP
task.shortdesc: As bitmap file format, BMP is a kind of raster image format. The object displayed on the screentogether with colored viewport and objects in the renderedviewport will be displayed in raster images as well.

context.p: Export the entire drawing or partly export the drawing to device-independent raster images using EXPORT command.
To export a drawing to a BMP file

step.cmd: Choose File > Export from the main menu.
In the Export Data dialog box, under Files of Type, choose the Bitmap (*.bmp) file format.
Specify the name of the file you want to create.
Select the objects youwant to save, andthen press Enter.
